name: AI Agent Factory - Devin Integration
description: MCP server for Devin AI to access PRDs and create agents in the AI Agent Factory platform

secrets.ENDCAP_API_URL: AI Agent Factory API URL (default: http://localhost:8000)
secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN: GitHub personal access token for repository creation

tools.name: get_prd_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific PRD by ID
tools.use_case: When Devin needs to understand the requirements for creating an agent

tools.name: list_available_prds
tools.description: List all PRDs available for agent creation
tools.use_case: When Devin needs to see what PRDs are ready for processing

tools.name: create_agent_from_prd
tools.description: Create a new AI agent based on a PRD specification
tools.use_case: When Devin is ready to create an agent from a PRD

tools.name: get_agent_library_info
tools.description: Get information about available agent libraries and tools
tools.use_case: When Devin needs to understand available templates and tools

tools.name: update_agent_status
tools.description: Update the status of an agent (e.g., mark as deployed)
tools.use_case: When Devin completes agent implementation and deployment

workflow.step_1: Devin calls 'list_available_prds' to see what PRDs are ready
workflow.step_2: Devin calls 'get_prd_details' to understand specific requirements
workflow.step_3: Devin calls 'get_agent_library_info' to understand available tools
workflow.step_4: Devin calls 'create_agent_from_prd' to create the agent record
workflow.step_5: Devin implements the agent code using the PRD requirements
workflow.step_6: Devin calls 'update_agent_status' when implementation is complete
